children.value: Raccoon is low-latency horizontally scalable ingestion service. Gojek is using this service to enable realtime application in combination with other components such as

. Raccoon is event schema agnostic. Which means, there is no restriction in serialization format or the form of the events. An example of Raccoon powered feature is pricing calculation based on impression. Internally we are actively powering more and more features to come.
Raccoon is still on active development. Raccoon was designed by

. I implemented Raccoon from the early stage of the project, finished the MVP, and brought it to opensource. The first cut of the project is to support Websocket, have event agnostic protocol, and have a basic routing mechanism for Kafka publisher.

frontmatter.title: ODPF/Raccoon
frontmatter.description: A high-throughput, low-latency service to collect events in real-time from your web, mobile apps, and services using multiple network protocols.
